.. _introduction:

Introduction
============

GeneCover is a combinatorial method for label-free marker gene selection based on gene-gene correlation.

Installation
------------

To install GeneCover, run:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install genecover

Dependencies:
    - Python >= 3.8
    - numpy, scipy, gurobipy


Source Code: https://github.com/ANWANGJHU/GeneCover
